meanings.definition: In a manner that does not respond or react.
meanings.sent1: She sat unresponsively during the entire lecture, not even nodding once.
meanings.sent2: The cat stared unresponsively at the toy mouse, showing no interest.
meanings.sent3: The robot behaved unresponsively when asked to dance, much to the amusement of the audience.
meanings.sent4: The old computer printer whirred unresponsively, refusing to print any documents.
meanings.sent5: The dark clouds hung unresponsively in the sky, foretelling a storm.

meanings.definition: Without showing any reaction or emotion.
meanings.sent1: He listened unresponsively to the sad story, his face blank and unreadable.
meanings.sent2: The toddler stared unresponsively at the colorful balloons, lost in thought.
meanings.sent3: The actor played the scene unresponsively, making the audience burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The painting hung unresponsively on the wall, devoid of any emotional impact.
meanings.sent5: The music played unresponsively in the background, creating a dull atmosphere.
